sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar' import './index.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Index = ({ name , profile , biography, external_url , follow_count, following_count,posts, post_count }) => { function convert(value) { if(value>=1000000) { value=(value/1000000)+"M" } else if(value>=1000) { value=(value/1000)+"K"; } return value; } return ( <>
{name}
{convert(post_count)} post
{convert(follow_count)} follower
{convert(following_count)} following
{biography}
{external_url}

more posts from {name}

{ posts.map((item) => (
  {item.node.edge_liked_by.count}         {item.node.edge_media_to_comment.count}
)) }
) } export default Index
